resources.title: Unity Cs Reference
resources.description: The C# part of the Unity engine and editor source code. May be used for reference purposes only

resources.title: NuGet For Unity (by GlitchEnzo)
resources.description: A NuGet Package Manager for Unity

resources.title: Eflatun.SceneReference (by Starikcetin)
resources.description: Unity Scene References for Runtime and Editor. Strongly typed, robust, and reliable. Provides GUID, Path, Build Index, Name, and Address

resources.title: Open UPM CLI
resources.description: The command-line tool to maintain the Unity manifest file for 3rd-party upm registries, offering a similar but lighter experience like npm or yarn for Node.js

resources.title: Unity Simple File Browser
resources.description: A uGUI based runtime file browser for Unity 3D (draggable and resizable)

resources.title: XChart
resources.description: A charting and data visualization library for Unity

resources.title: Fancy Scroll View
resources.description: A versatile Unity scroll view component that enables highly flexible animations

resources.title: UI Effects
resources.description: UIEffect is an open-source package that allows you to intuitively apply rich UI effects directly from the Inspector or via code

resources.title: Particle Effect For uGUI
resources.description: Render particle effect in UnityUI(uGUI). Maskable, sortable, and no extra Camera/RenderTexture/Canvas

resources.title: Soft Mask For uGUI
resources.description: Enhance Unity UI (uGUI) with advanced soft-masking features to create more visually appealing effects

resources.title: HSV Color Picker
resources.description: HSV color picker for uGUI

resources.title: Naughty Water Buoyancy (by dbrizov)
resources.description: Water Buoyancy Simulation for Unity

resources.title: Trajectory Line Unity (by Matthew-J-Spencer)
resources.description: A powerful trajectory line for Unity

resources.title: Unity GOAP (by Crashkonijn)
resources.description: A robust, multi-threaded Goal Oriented Action Planning (GOAP) system designed for Unity, empowering developers to create complex AI behaviors with ease

resources.title: UniState
resources.description: UniState is a modern, high-performance, scalable state machine package for Unity

resources.title: UniTask
resources.description: Provides an efficient allocation free async/await integration for Unity

resources.title: VContainer
resources.description: The extra fast, feature full, Dependency Injection library running on Unity Game Engine

resources.title: Extenject [Deprecated]
resources.description: Old, but still useful, dependency injection framework for Unity; industrial standard

resources.title: Reflex
resources.description: Blazing fast, minimal but complete(except of il2cpp problems) dependency injection library for Unity

resources.title: Mathf's (by FreyaHolmer)
resources.description: Expanded math functionality for Unity by FreyaHolmer

resources.title: Math Utilities (by Zalo)
resources.description: A grab bag of some of the neat math and physics tricks that Zalo amassed over the last few years, implemented in Unity's C#. You're free to use the code here however you like

resources.title: Unity3D Curves (by gabrielgiordan)
resources.description: 2D curves in polar and Cartesian coordinates, 3D curves, surfaces and fractals for the Unity3D game engine

resources.title: VLC Unity
resources.description: LibVLC plugin for Unity to integrate multimedia playback inside your Unity apps and games

resources.title: In-Game Debug Console
resources.description: A uGUI based console to see debug messages and execute commands during gameplay in Unity

resources.title: Graphy
resources.description: Graphy is the ultimate, easy to use, feature packed FPS counter, stats monitor and debugger for your Unity project
